content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers:
The structure consists of approximately 20 building blocks arranged in 3 main layers:
- Bottom layer: Base foundations and supports
- Middle layer: Main structural elements
- Top layer: Roof elements and decorative pieces

## Spatial Relationships:
The structure has two distinct sections:

### Left Section:
- Green rectangular blocks (vertical) on both sides
- Orange cylindrical pieces in the center
- Red rectangular structure with an arch on top
- Orange triangular roof piece on the top

### Right Section:
- Red arch pieces forming the base
- Yellow horizontal blocks above the base
- Green vertical rectangular pillars supporting the top
- Yellow horizontal blocks on top of the pillars
- Orange triangular roof piece on the top

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, I'll need the following blocks:

1. Block index 1: Red arch block (for right structure base)
2. Block index 2: Red arch block (for right structure base)
3. Block index 5: Green vertical rectangular block (for pillars and side supports)
4. Block index 6: Green horizontal rectangular block (for side supports)
5. Block index 7: Yellow horizontal rectangular block (for top platform)
6. Block index 8: Yellow horizontal rectangular block (for middle platform)
7. Block index 10: Orange vertical cylinder (for left structure)
8. Block index 11: Orange horizontal cylinder (for left structure)
9. Block index 12: Orange triangular block (for roof)
10. Block index 13: Orange triangular block (for roof)
11. Block index 14: Orange triangular block (for side element)
12. Block index 15: Orange rectangular block (for middle element)
13. Block index 3: Red curved block (for arch element)
14. Block index 4: Red curved block with cutout (for left structure)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 1
   Step2: Move block with index 2
   Step3: Move block with index 5
   Step4: Move block with index 5
   Step5: Move block with index 5
   Step6: Move block with index 6
   Step7: Move block with index 6
   Step8: Move block with index 8
   Step9: Move block with index 7
   Step10: Move block with index 10
   Step11: Move block with index 11
   Step12: Move block with index 4
   Step13: Move block with index 3
   Step14: Move block with index 15
   Step15: Move block with index 14
   Step16: Move block with index 12
   Step17: Move block with index 13
}
```
